p: In yet another study, the DPPH scavenging test was carried out on extracts from in vitro suspension cultures of A. absinthium [ 34, 109]. The highest antioxidant activity (82.7%) and maximum accumulation of flavonoids (1.89 mg quercetin equivalent/g DW) and phenols (3.57 mg gallic acid equivalent/g DW) were demonstrated for a 30-day suspension culture [ 35].
